definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale

sentences.english: Therefore, the Lama Temple main hall to the original green glazed tile yellow glazed tile.
sentences.chinese: 因此，雍和宫主要殿堂原绿色琉璃瓦改为黄色琉璃瓦。

sentences.english: Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
sentences.chinese: 现在的雍和宫属于黄教的寺庙，香火很旺。

sentences.english: I want to take you all to visit the Lama Temple.
sentences.chinese: 我要带大家去参观雍和宫。

sentences.english: Take the No. 909 bus just besides our hotel about 30 minutes to get.
sentences.chinese: 宾馆附近雍和宫桥东坐909路公车大山子下车。

sentences.english: It can be said that the Lama Temple is the "specifications" the highest a Buddhist temple.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，雍和宫是全国“规格”最高的一座佛教寺院。

sentences.english: If you are not too busy, we could go to the Lama Temple.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不太忙，咱们可以去雍和宫。

definition: Fayuan or Source of the Law temple in Beijing
Baita temple in Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1]
Xizhimen neighborhood of Beijing/the main northwest gate of Beijing
Houhai, a lake and the area surrounding it in central Beijing
